comments:
Enviroment: Eclipse 3.0 + CDT 2.0
Project: Standard Make C++
Project is shared using VSS.

steps to reproduce:
1. Open project properties C++ Indexer tab.
2. Set/remove check on Report preprocessor probems
 Or set/remove check on Report semantic probems
 or set/remove check on Report syntactic probems.
3. Press OK button

Problem:
Shows message box with text: "An error has occurred. See error log for more 
details." And project properties is not saved.

The error log message (in workbench\.metadata\.log):
